729430f-a.folder: Richmond Terrace & Hamilton Avenue, Staten Island, NY
729430f-a.text:
(1)
Richmond Terrace, west side, between Hamilton Avenue and Wall
Street, showing the Children's Court House.
June 13, 1937
P. L. Sperr
(2)
The same, looking north.
June 13, 1937
P. L. Sperr
729430f-a.title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Hamilton Avenue
